programme.title: Organic Panic
programme.desc: Fashion isnt just about adornment and style. What you wear can change the lives of people around the world, for better or worse. In this episode we look at how local designers and global chains respond to the growing demand for organic fashions. Furniture designer Lisa North is passionate about her personal style, but wonders if her clothes were made at the expense of garment workers health and safety. Kelly Drennan, founder of Fashion Takes Action, a group committed to reforming the fashion industry, explains how toxic materials and waste from conventional clothes pollute the earth and cost you money. Emily Scarlett, PR manager for HandM takes Lisa on a tour of their private showroom and makes the case for a corporate giant doing more to promote organic materials than anyone else. Lisas love of vintage clothes inspires her to simplify a complex problem.

programme.title: Big Coast
programme.desc: Chasing big Chinook Salmon just outside Rivers Inlet, BC from Duncanby Lodge!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Were looking hard, but the numbers arent stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us. Maybe we really are alone in our neck of the galaxy!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Cubesats the tiny Satellites are growing in main stream popularity, they have even been sent to Mars with the Insight Mission.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: The Tigers From Scotland
programme.desc: Narrated by Iain Glen, this film focuses on the fragile existence of the Scottish Wildcats, their status and what conservation efforts are being undertaken to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Underwater Okavango
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta is one of the richest ecosystems on earth, but most of its creatures are rarely seen by human eyes. They hide beneath the surface, in the intricate underwater world of the Delta. Fearsome hippos and man-eating crocodiles guard these waters, and diving here is considered extremely dangerous. Few humans have ever ventured below the surface, until now. A team of film makers armed with experience and a deep knowledge of animal behaviour have dived the delta for the past year. Their experiences reveal a new, unexplored wilderness that is shaped by passage of the deltas epic winter flood. Every summer, rains that collect in Angola surge down the Okavango River in a giant pulse. Just as the dry season draws near, that pulse reaches the delta, and sets a chain reaction of life in motion. Landscapes flood as the pulse pushes through, and drain in its wake. These forces shape the lives of every creature in the underwater Okavango. The first to feel the effects of the flood are the cave dwellers. The rising tide lifts vast floating carpets of reeds and papyrus off the sand, creating a labyrinth of caves beneath them. Mormyrids and squeakers hunt in the dark, but the live in fear of a far larger predator. Sharp toothed catfish are amongst the Deltas most voracious hunters. They plague the smaller fish, but they in turn are hunted by giant crocodiles. As the pulse pushes into the main delta, tiny fish are sucked into the deep channels behind it. The waters fill with predators that gather to feast on the soup of small fry. The flood keeps pushing further and further out into Botswana, until in the peak of the dry season, it breaks out over dry land. Creatures travel from across Botswana to meet the life-giving tide. Huge elephant breeding herds flee the drought-stricken Kalahari, and walk hundreds of kilometres to reach the flooded delta. Though the water offers life, it harbours death as well. Their tiny infants must navigate crocodile infested floodplains, and face off with lions in the dense reeds. Nowhere is safe, until the flood finally reaches the end of its journey. Just as the rains threaten to bring the dry season to a close, the closing act of the underwater delta launches into action. Birds flock to the disappearing shallows to feast on trapped fish, and the fearsome catfish amass into an army. They charge down the channels by the hundred, and flush fish from the reeds. The stampede of hunters makes the water boil, and entices a new killer to the feast. Fish eagles swoop down one after the other, and snatch catfish from the churning waters. The frenzy of predators builds to a crescendo, until rains finally douse the feast. The wet season marks the end of the flood, but it feeds the beginnings of another. As rainwaters gather once more in the Angolan highlands, the journey of a new pulse begins. This film opens a window on an unexplored landscape of exquisite beauty, and the creatures that must play the daily lottery of life and death within it.

programme.title: Diving With Crocodiles
programme.desc: In Africas waterways, one predator reigns supreme - the Nile crocodile. One of the biggest and most deadly reptiles on Earth, it commands a fearsome reputation and strikes terror those who share its domain. Countless attacks in which victims are ruthlessly taken from riverbanks or attacked in their canoes leave no doubt that the Nile crocodile may views humans as natural prey. In fact, the animal was recently reclassified as the number one killer of humans in Africa, overtaking the previous record holder, the hippo. In "Diving with Crocodiles" cameraman and crocodile expert Brad Bestelink undertakes the unthinkable and dives into the waters of the Okavango Delta. Without a cage or any other protection, he gets up close and personal with these fearsome creatures in this groundbreaking film. Such a feat has never been recorded before. But Brad is well prepared - his decision to take the plunge is the result of many years spent studying crocodile behavior in his native Botswana. His window of opportunity to dive is small and dependent on the seasonal ebb and flow of the Okavango. There are only a couple of months each year when visibility in the delta allows for perfect filming conditions. This extraordinary film provides all the high drama associated with modern-day exploration, coupled with the exhilaration of interacting with wild animals. The underwater secrets of the Nile crocodile are revealed with unique and compelling footage in the pristine underwater environment of the Okavango delta.

programme.title: Cheetahs Of the Deep
programme.desc: The Canary Islands are sheltered by a mild climate, protected from any extremes of weather. But high up on the towering mountains, the conditions can turn treacherous. In winter, water is released by high altitude storms and fertilized by nutrients washed from the soil. As this drains into the sea the soupy waters around the islands attract a huge variety of life, draw in in from the vast Atlantic Ocean. Many whale and dolphin species congregate in these waters, but above all Short-finned pilot whales are found here in the vast numbers.Isora is the leader and matriarch of one of the largest resident pilot whale pods between Tenerife and La Gomera and we document her activities over a one year period. Several females and their offspring form the hard-core of this close-knit society where all the main family members are related to the mother. Males in the pod also play a role, but not in reproduction, as they are blood relatives. With their vow of chastity, they ensure the protection of newborns and juveniles - a long-term investment which is crucial for pod survival.Physical contact is important for the whales and the film reveals moving and rarely-seen interaction between the older pod members and the new arrivals. But this carefree innocence is undermined by harrowing footage of the effect plastic waste is having on the whales and other species. Large squid are the pilot whales preferred food source and the best feeding grounds lie a thousand metres deep. But they are masters of deep diving and are involved in titanic battles with the squid on daily basis.As the mothers give birth we examine the close bonds between the new arrivals and the pod, and how the whales deal with the tragic death of one of the calves.This film also looks at other whale and dolphin species which frequent the area, including the rarely seen Rissos dolphin, Brydes Whales and Atlantic Spotted Dolphins. Green sea turtles also frequent the area, attracted by the rich-sea grass beds which surround the islands.Filmed in stunning HD, this film delivers a comprehensive portrait of a unique and protected underwater haven, one of Europes last frontiers before the mysterious deep Atlantic takes hold.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: On the surface, the black lagoon looks peaceful. But dip beneath and a murky world of twisted mangrove roots and seagrass beds is revealed. A dark realm of freakish killers waiting to unleash bursts of speed. The otherworldy Mantis Shrimp has spears for arms. Eels make lightning fast strikes with their alien jaws. And a Bullsharks stolen meal leads to a feeding frenzy of Blacktip sharks. Theres a lot more happening here than the calm veneer suggests.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: As a new year starts in the heart of Africa, the rainy season has come to the Okavango Delta in Botswana, and with it begins a season of plenty and the luxury of permanent and abundant water sources. In South Africas Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Game Reserve, a group of rare samango monkeys take advantage of the abundant fruit born by a large Natal fig tree. In Thailand, a group of rhesus macaques have discovered a mango tree, and are busy feeding and stuffing their throat pouches with the fruit. Back in the Okavango Delta, the rains have also brought large buffalo herds back to the Xakanaxa area, the territory of a powerful pride of lions. Life and death are also a close-run thing for young gannet fledglings on their massive breeding colony of 50.000 birds on Malgas Island off the South African coast. As the young birds attempt to spread their wings and take to the air, some end up in the water. Many young animals have to run a gauntlet early on in life, and as a young loggerhead turtle hatches out of its egg and emerges from the sand on a beach in Mozambique, it faces a gruelling journey from its nest on the beach down to the sea. African penguins, too, are adapted to life at sea, but rest, breed and mate on land. Penguins elsewhere in the world face an almost unbelievable challenge to breed and rear their young. When it comes to raising animals, the African plains are no more forgiving than the sub-Antarctic. At this time of year, the Serengeti plains in Tanzania are teeming with herds of wildebeest and zebra with their young. Predators are never far away. In a Thai forest, stingless bees are busy building a cone-shaped nest in a tree, combining forces for the greater good of the colony. Kamfers Dam in South Africa is one of only four breeding colonies of Lesser Flamingos, at times reaching up to 50.000 birds. The sun sets over the spectacular sight of thousands of flamingos, straining the water for food and taking to the air.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and ﬁ ctional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battleﬁ eld. Using its "sub-second" analysis techniques and intimate ﬁrst-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays "soldiers for hire" and how private armies are re-shaping the way conﬂ icts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Tetovēšanas salona īpašnieks Deniss Ābrahamsens atrasts brutāli noslepkavots, kails uz masāžas galda savās mājās. Pierādījumi liecina par traku seksa ballīti, kas ar slavenu pieaugušo aktrisi beigusies nelāgi.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Ārpus Čikāgas tiek atrasts smagi apdedzis ķermenis, policija nenogurstoši strādā, lai atrastu šī jaunā, strādīgā kravas automašīnas vadītāja slepkavu. Meklēšanas rezultātā viņi nonāk pie pusaudžu māsu pāra, kas gadiem ilgi spējušas izvairīties no policijas sagūstīšanas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Tetovēšanas salona īpašnieks Deniss Ābrahamsens atrasts brutāli noslepkavots, kails uz masāžas galda savās mājās. Pierādījumi liecina par traku seksa ballīti, kas ar slavenu pieaugušo aktrisi beigusies nelāgi.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Slepkava par mērķi uzstāda pilsētas likumsargu komūnu. Vai viņu notvers pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Dena Sandovala pēc nesenās šķiršanās cer atsākt randiņu dzīvi, taču līdz ar tās aizsākumu, viņa pazūd skaidrās debesīs, aiz sevis atstājot mistēriju Ņūmeksikas tuksnesī, kas beidzas ar šausminošu atklājumu.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Vai rakstnieces apsēstība ar noziegumiem varētu palīdzēt viņas tumšākajai fantāzijai? Pašpasludinātās romānistes sižets par vīra pāragru nāvi iegūst negaidītu pavērsienu, un operācija atklāj sagrozītu patiesību.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Masu apšaudē Čelsijā ir viens bojāgājušais un trīs ievainotie. Izmeklētāji atklāj, ka šī ir jaunākā slepkavību sērija, kas aptver vairākus iecirkņus. Izmeklētāji nonāk Ņujorkas pazemes pasaulē.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad lauku bāra patrons tiek noslepkavots nāvessoda stilā, divi apņēmīgi izmeklētāji izseko brāļu slepkavu pāri un risina šausmīgāko noziegumu mazās pilsētiņas vēsturē.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaista divu bērnu māte Kristāla Makdauela pazuda viesuļvētras Hārvija laikā, kas plosās Hjūstonā. Novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie viņas slepkavas.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad Kalifornijā pazūd četru cilvēku, tostarp divu mazu bērnu, ģimene, policija uzskata, ka viņi aizbēguši. Paiet desmitgade līdz atklājas - viņus nogalinājis slepkava, kas nozieguma brīdī nemaz nebija slēpies.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Keiona Brekstone ar sajūsmu gaida sava pirmā bērna dzimšanu, taču, kad detektīvi tiek izsaukti uz viņas degošo dzīvokli, viņi atklāj nepārspējamu vardarbību. Lai atrastu slepkavu, izmeklētājiem jāizmanto norādes uz pašas Keionas ķermeņa.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Ģimenes drāma kļūst nāvējoša - atstumta vīramāte lūdz senu draudzeni, kurai savulaik bijusi saikne ar mafiju, nogalināt viņas vedeklu.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji sacenšas, lai atklātu dīvaino savējā slepkavību, pirms viltīgais slepkava izslīd no valsts.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Divi brāļi tuksnesī īsteno sarežģītu shēmu, enšoties no bruņota furgona nozagt 300 tūkstošus dolāru. Kad izmeklētāji mēģina izsekot laupītājus, lieta kļūst par slepkavību - tiek atrasti abu furgonu vadījušo apsargu līķi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Glamūrīgā bijusī modele Samira Fraša dzīvoja greznu dzīvi, īrējot vairākas mājas un pārvietojoties ar luksusa automašīnām. Līdz notika traģēdija. Divu bērnu māte tika atrasta mirusi sava peldbaseina gultnē, un abi viņas bērni bija pazuduši no mājas.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Armijnieks tiek nošauts kādā Kalifornijas tuksneša mazpilsētā. Izmeklēšana pārbauda draudzības saiknes un ģimenes lojalitāti, cenšoties atrast slepkavu.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Vientuļā māte Nikola Halpina noslepkavota savās mājās. Viņas divi bērni kļūst par uzbrukuma aculieciniekiem, taču taisnīgums gūs virsroku - detektīvi izsijās Nikolas cienītāju sarakstu, atrodot viņas slepkavu.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Zināms acu ķirurgs lūdz savam IT speciālsitam atrast krievu slepkavu, kas nogalinātu bijušo darbinieku. Notikumiem sākoties, viņš maina mērķi.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Neatkarīgo filmu zvaigzne atrasta mirusi Griničvilidžā, un tas ir šķietama pašnāvība. Kad izmeklētāji sāk atklāt vienu baismīgu pavedienu pēc otra, viņi saprot, ka lietas nav tādas, kā šķiet.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Divi brāļi tuksnesī īsteno sarežģītu shēmu, enšoties no bruņota furgona nozagt 300 tūkstošus dolāru. Kad izmeklētāji mēģina izsekot laupītājus, lieta kļūst par slepkavību - tiek atrasti abu furgonu vadījušo apsargu līķi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Glamūrīgā bijusī modele Samira Fraša dzīvoja greznu dzīvi, īrējot vairākas mājas un pārvietojoties ar luksusa automašīnām. Līdz notika traģēdija. Divu bērnu māte tika atrasta mirusi sava peldbaseina gultnē, un abi viņas bērni bija pazuduši no mājas.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad budžeta samazinājumi draud izķidāt Vitloku un apdraudēt darbu, Džeks savervē Mēriju, Stefu un Mišelu, lai atbrīvotos no uzrauga. Durbins plāno aicinājumu sirdij, bet studenti - dvēselei.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad izplatās apkaunojošs video, kurā redzams, kā viņš nokrīt no skatuves, Džeks plāno izveidot savu populāro video. Durbins, Helēna un skolotāji izseko Vitloka bēdīgi slavenāko piemēslotāju: Cukurtēvu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls mēģina palīdzēt kādam vīrietim, kuru viņš pamatskolā apbižoja, taču slēpj savu patieso identitāti, jo vīrietis ir kļuvis par biedējošu kultūristu. Rendijs sāk uzņemt haizivs adrenalīnu, lai beidzot varētu stāties pretī Džojai.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džena ieradusies Skrentonā, lai visām dāmām sniegtu lekciju par sievietēm darbavietā. Saskumis, ka viņš nevar piedalīties seminārā, Maikls visus vīriešus aizved uz noliktavu pavadīt laiku "puišu kompānijā".

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls mēģina palīdzēt kādam vīrietim, kuru viņš pamatskolā apbižoja, taču slēpj savu patieso identitāti, jo vīrietis ir kļuvis par biedējošu kultūristu. Rendijs sāk uzņemt haizivs adrenalīnu, lai beidzot varētu stāties pretī Džojai.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls mēģina palīdzēt kādam vīrietim, kuru viņš pamatskolā apbižoja, taču slēpj savu patieso identitāti, jo vīrietis ir kļuvis par biedējošu kultūristu. Rendijs sāk uzņemt haizivs adrenalīnu, lai beidzot varētu stāties pretī Džojai.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks ieceļ Lizu par Endžijas pasākuma vadītāju, cerot, ka viņa spēs emocionāli manipulēt ar Endžiju, lai vērstos pie Treisija. "Jordānas karalienes" kameras rada Džekam zināmu apmulsumu, vienlaikus atstājot Džennu uzmanības badā. Frenka dzīvē atgriežas zaudēta mīlestība, liekot viņam apšaubīt savu briedumu.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Treisijs joprojām atrodas Āfrikā, tādēļ TGS turpina "piespiedu pārtraukumu", liekot ikvienam sākt kalt citus karjeras plānus. Džeks vēršas pie Devona Benksa, lai izkļūtu no problēmām ar Kebltaunas izpilddirektoru.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs nolemj nofotografēties ģimenes bildē Marijas Ziemassvētku dāvanai. Taču viņa nevēlējās, lai tajā būtu Debras ģimene.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija sāk domāt, ka Roberts ir gejs - viņš atkal izšķīries ar Eimiju.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls mēģina palīdzēt kādam vīrietim, kuru viņš pamatskolā apbižoja, taču slēpj savu patieso identitāti, jo vīrietis ir kļuvis par biedējošu kultūristu. Rendijs sāk uzņemt haizivs adrenalīnu, lai beidzot varētu stāties pretī Džojai.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Misija nozog sava tēva automašīnu un kopā ar draudzeni Peižu dodas ceļā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Džordžijs dodas uz dzimšanas dienas randiņu; Marija saturas ar Brendu par attiecībām ar Džordžu; Šeldons interesējas par Misijas iecienītāko TV šovu, un tas beidzas ar pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad Džeks tiek padzīts no Hārvardas plāna, viņam tiek piedāvāta iespēja pāriet pie Mērijas ar vienu nosacījumu — viņam jāpalīdz viņai šķirties no viņas gudrā drauga. Entonijs kļūst par Durbina labo roku.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pēc datora salūšanas Džeks pulcē savu klasi, lai uzvarētu ikgadējā konkursā "Whitlocks Got Talent", cerot naudas balvu novirzīt jaunam klēpjdatoram. Helēna un Durbins vada šovu. Mērija, Stefa un Mišela sagatavo procedūras.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad Rejs un Debra uzzina, ka pret Aliju nostājies kauslis, Rejs nolemj veikt izmeklēšanu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks stāsta Alijai, ka Rejs dodas uz elli, jo viņš neiet uz baznīcu. Jūtoties vainīgs par to, ka Frenks ir labs reliģiskais paraugs, Rejs nolemj kļūt par parastu draudzes locekli.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls devies uz Dunder Mifflin centrālo biroju Ņujorkā. Tur viņu un Dženu sagaida kas negaidīts. Tikmēr Skrentonā darbinieki svin Valentīndienu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls apmāca Dvaitu uzstāties - viņš nominēts kā gada labākais pārdevējs.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza un Kenets mēģina atrast, kur Ņujorkā slēpjas Treisijs, tā cenšoties glābt šovu. Dženna ir aizņemta ar šausmu filmas uzņemšanu Konektikutā, bet Pīts mēģina stāties pretī ļaundarīgam komandas loceklim.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Henks Hūpers draud pārtraukt "TGS", bet Džeks pārliecina viņu ļaut Lizai un kompānijai parādīt savu 100. sēriju. Lai radītu vislabāko iespējamo šovu, Lizai jātiek galā ar ne visai ideāliem darba apstākļiem. Gatavojoties izrādei, Džeks sāk šaubīties par svarīgu lēmumu savā dzīvē, bet Dženna apsver iespēju kļūt par māti.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erla centieni palīdzēt kādam, kurš vairākas reizes ir iekļauts viņa sarakstā, atved viņu atpakaļ pie savas vecās, noziedzīgās dzīves. Džoja riskē saņemt trešo triecienu - viņa ietriecās Katalīnā ar zāles pļaušanas traktoru.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Izmeklēšanas televīzijas šovs "Inside Probe" stāsta par Crab Shack īpašnieka pazušanu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons vēlas meklēt dzīvību uz citām planētām; Mendija atbild uz Džordžija bildinājumu. Misija ir nonākusi starp diviem draugiem.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija saņem aizraujošu darba iespēju, un Šeldons uztraucas, ka viņš atpaliek. Džordžijs ved savu meitu uz darbu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. programme.desc: Maikls devies uz Dunder Mifflin centrālo biroju Ņujorkā. Tur viņu un Dženu sagaida kas negaidīts. Tikmēr Skrentonā darbinieki svin Valentīndienu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls apmāca Dvaitu uzstāties - viņš nominēts kā gada labākais pārdevējs.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza un Kenets mēģina atrast, kur Ņujorkā slēpjas Treisijs, tā cenšoties glābt šovu. Dženna ir aizņemta ar šausmu filmas uzņemšanu Konektikutā, bet Pīts mēģina stāties pretī ļaundarīgam komandas loceklim.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Henks Hūpers draud pārtraukt "TGS", bet Džeks pārliecina viņu ļaut Lizai un kompānijai parādīt savu 100. sēriju. Lai radītu vislabāko iespējamo šovu, Lizai jātiek galā ar ne visai ideāliem darba apstākļiem. Gatavojoties izrādei, Džeks sāk šaubīties par svarīgu lēmumu savā dzīvē, bet Dženna apsver iespēju kļūt par māti.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erla centieni palīdzēt kādam, kurš vairākas reizes ir iekļauts viņa sarakstā, atved viņu atpakaļ pie savas vecās, noziedzīgās dzīves. Džoja riskē saņemt trešo triecienu - viņa ietriecās Katalīnā ar zāles pļaušanas traktoru.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Izmeklēšanas televīzijas šovs "Inside Probe" stāsta par Crab Shack īpašnieka pazušanu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons vēlas meklēt dzīvību uz citām planētām; Mendija atbild uz Džordžija bildinājumu. Misija ir nonākusi starp diviem draugiem.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija saņem aizraujošu darba iespēju, un Šeldons uztraucas, ka viņš atpaliek. Džordžijs ved savu meitu uz darbu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Klāt gada aizraujošākais laiks Vitlokā: Durbina dzimšanas diena un Garu nedēļa. Džeks dara visu iespējamo, lai izvairītos no skolas gara, bet visi pārējie pulcējas, lai apkarotu savus nīstos konkurentus no Prērijas skolas.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Koledžu izstāde ierodas Vitlokā, un Sarikai ir piedāvājums Džekam: tikt Hārvardā, un viņa iegūs viņa grāmatu savas izdevējas rokās; Stefa gatavojas svinībām; Helēna piesakās koledžā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Robertam ir saķeršanās ar bulli, un viņam kādu laiku jāpaliek kopā ar Mariju un Frenku.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs nejauši pa virsu kāzu videoierakstam pārraksta futbola spēli, kā rezultātā Debra ir ļoti saniknota.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Bērni ieradušies Dunder Mifflin uz gadskārtējo bērnu dienu darbā. Maikls ir pārsteigts, labi satiekot ar Tobija meitu. Pema izmisīgi mēģina sadraudzēties ar kolēģa meitu, bet Raiens nokļūst zem Stenlija lupas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Svinot savu dzimšanas dienu, Maikls visus ielūdz uz obligātu slidotavas apmeklējumu.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lizas vasaras atvaļinājums tiek izbojāts - uzrodas Treisijs.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Azartspēļu istabā ielaužas, un Šeldons vēlas studēt ārzemēs. Misija iegūst jaunu draugu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija pārsteidz Džordžiju ar spa nedēļas nogali. Šeldons gatavojas vasarai Vācijā.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri atriezušies no pasaules klejojumiem, lai savu māju atrastu uz sabrukšanas robežas, turklāt tajā iemitinājies jauns un baiss radījums.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nandora mīlas meklējumi beidzot rezultējas panākumiem, bet Nadja apjauš, ka viņas mūža lielākā ambīcija ir atvērt savu vampīru naktsklubu.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad kāda jauna sieviete tiek aplaupīta un nogalināta savās mājās blakus klaidoņu apmetnes vietai, Mērdoks, Brekenrīds un Votss aizdomās turamo meklē klaidoņu vidū.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks pēta, kad matemātiķis, kas piedalās Džeimsa Pendrika jaunās attēlu pārraides sakaru ierīces demonstrācijā, tiek nogalināts, kamēr investoru istaba šausmās skatās.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ielejā iestājies pavasaris. Džeimss atgriežas Daroubijā, viņa prātu pārņēmusi Helēna un jāpieņem neiespējams lēmums. Tikmēr Tristanam ir jāsaprot, vai patiesība vienmēr ir labākā izvēle.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks pēta, kad matemātiķis, kas piedalās Džeimsa Pendrika jaunās attēlu pārraides sakaru ierīces demonstrācijā, tiek nogalināts, kamēr investoru istaba šausmās skatās.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Tristans palīdz Zigfrīdam ar sarežģītu klientu un atgādina par to, kāds kādreiz bija viņš pats. Džeimss cer, ka pavasara ballē notikumi ar Helēnu virzīsies uz priekšu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad tiek atrasts noslepkavots mūziķis ar daudzām brūcēm, Vatss stāsta Mērdokam un Hārtam, ka noziegums tika dokumentēts dziesmā, kuru viņš dzirdēja iepriekšējā vakarā Kasiopejas naktsklubā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Krabtrī ir satriekts, kad Amēlija Ernsta, viena no apjukušajām māsām, kas viņu nolaupīja, padodas; Efija vēlas likt viņai stāties pretī ar pilnu taisnīguma spēku, taču viņu satriec gudrs advokāts.

programme.title: Dalgliešs

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Jaunas atraitnes liktenis rada sarežģījumus Džeimsa un Helēnas romantiskajās attiecībās, bet Trikija Vū apmeklējums izraisa haosu Skeldeilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad tiek noslepkavots vīrietis, kurš atgādina Mērdoku, detektīvs veic izmeklēšanu, vienlaikus uzraugot savu un mazuļa Suzannas drošību.

programme.desc: The Shanghai Masters is a professional snooker tournament. Originally a ranking event but in 2018 it became a non-ranking invitation event. Ronnie OSullivan is the reigning champion he won the 2018 title, the first time it has been defended.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Cartel War
programme.desc: L.A. undercover cops disregard the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the United States. Loosely based on Mexicos once most powerful drug cartel leader, this journey into the drug underworld cuts to the bone and through the heart. Hard realities intertwine when an elite division of L.A. undercover narcotics cops, Division 123, begins to peel away the layers of a powerful drug cartel to undermine their manipulative influence. A study in humanity: of the cops and the challenge they face to balance a commitment to those they love, against their commitment to task and ability to protect. At one moment, immersed in the glitz of L.A.s glamor and the next, looping into the citys seedy underbelly, "DISRUPT/DISMANTLE" follows these officers as they go head-to-head with a ruthless yet seductive foe. Echoing the familiar scenario of cops vs. bad guys, this story presents itself with new vigor, fresh and focused on the lives of determined cops making choices - and mistakes. As the discovery of bodies begins to tarnish the investigation - including the brutal murder of one of their own, Division 123 disregards the law to bring down the most powerful drug mob in the U.S...

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Dot.Kill
programme.desc: A detective tries to hunt down a serial killer who broadcasts his murders live on the internet.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Copper Jack Stone purposefully orchestrates a bank robbery in order to be thrown into prison with the notorious Russian kingpin Balam. Balam is more than just a mob criminal; hes a very cunning and dangerous lord who controls the police force from behind bars. Balam lives in prison as a cover for his real power, which is King of the city. His cell is a lavish private room built specifically for him, inaccessible to most in the depths of the prison structure. Even the warden fears venturing into his area of the prison. However, even surrounded by his loyal henchmen and guards in his sectioned off fortress, Balam doesnt know Jack is coming for him to avenge his family, who Balam murdered in cold blood. Balam is tough... but Jack is tougher.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Digging Into China
programme.desc: Harriet, a ten-year old girl, lives together with her big sister and her alcoholic mother out in the countryside. The family runs a motel. Harriet is different from the others, as she owns a great creativity and has nobody to play with. Her infinite world exists only in her mind. One day, Ricky comes along. He is a grown-up, but retarded son of an elderly lady. Soon, Harriet and Ricky share their experiences of life from a different point of view and become close friends. But his mother still plans to give Ricky away into professional care in a home, because she wont live forever to be there for him.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Young Jim Hawkins and Peg-legged Long John Silver set sail for adventure in Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of dastardly pirates, swashbuckling heroes, buried treasure, and a young boys courage during the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Fatal Sin
programme.desc: A boy and a girl fall in love. But on the night they met, she was drunk and stoned and he toke advantage of her. Although she does not remember almost anything from that night, she remembers something that may compromise their relationship.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Nopietns cilvēks
programme.desc: Vidusrietumu fizikas skolotājs Lerijs Gopniks vēro, kā viņa dzīve atrisinās vairāku pēkšņu incidentu dēļ. Neraugoties uz to, ka viņš nemieros meklē jēgu un atbildes, viņš, šķiet, turpina grimt.

programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis slepkavojot atriebjas par savu mīļoto, kura gājusi bojā, pārdozējot narkotikas.

programme.desc: Jaunās Mias Holas dzīve izmainās acumirklī - pēc autoavārijas viņa nonāk komā. Ārpusķermeņa pieredzes laikā viņai jāizlemj vai pamosties un dzīvot dzīvi, kas ir daudz savādāka, nekā viņa bija iedomājusies. Izvēle ir viņas ziņā.

programme.title: Operācija "Fortūna": Māksla uzvarēt
programme.desc: Kad nāvējoša jaunu ieroču tehnoloģija draud izjaukt pasaules kārtību, īpašais aģents Orsons Fortūns un viņa komanda savervē vienu no Holivudas lielākajām filmu zvaigznēm, kam jāpalīdz slepenajā misijā.

programme.title: Simona
programme.desc: Kinorežisoram Viktoram Taranskim ir apnikušas aktieru mūžīgās kaprīzes un ultimāti. Bet nu viņš ir atradis ideālu aktrisi - visskaistāko, vistalantīgāko, kas nekad neiebilst un nekad neko neprasa. Tiešām žēl, ka Simone eksistē... tikai virtuāli, nav nekas vairāk kā datora kods, nulles un vieninieki. Taču arī savus straujos panākumus Taranskis apturēt nevēlas, īstenībā neeksistējošās aktrises faniem vilšanos sagādāt negrib, tāpēc cenšas saglabāt intrigu un neatklāt patiesību cik vien iespējams ilgi.

programme.title: Suņu sala
programme.desc: Kad pēc korumpētā mēra pavēles visi Megasaki pilsētas suņi tiek nosūtīti dzīvot uz vientuļas salas, 12 gadus veco Atari vienatnē dodas glābt savu uzticamo suni Spotu. Kopā ar pārējiem suņiem viņš uzsāk krusta gājienu pret korumpēto mēru.

programme.title: Dalasas pircēju klubs
programme.desc: Teksasas kovboja Rona Vudrūfa dzīvi satricina pēkšņa diagnoze - HIV pozitīvs. Dzīvot viņam atlikušas 30 dienas. Tolaik, 1985.gadā tikai sāka apzināties AIDS izplatību un to, kā cīnīties ar šo vīrusu. Rons, no kura novērsās daudzi viņa kādreizējie draugi, sāk pats meklēt legālus un nelegālus ārstēšanās veidus... Galveno lomu filmā, kuras pamatā ir patiesi notikumi, atveido Metjū Makkonahijs, viņam līdzās Džereds Leto, Dženifera Gārnere un citi.

programme.title: Marija Antuanete
programme.desc: Filma par Francijas galantā laika pavēlnieci - Mariju Antuaneti, kura kā naiva princese no Austrijas galma tika ievesta intrigu un skandālu pārbagātajā franču aristokrātijā, lai apprecētos ar Luiju XVI. Būdama pusaudze, viņa pārvar savas bailes un kļūst par vienu no pretrunīgāk vērtētajām personām - sava laikmeta un Francijas simbolu.

programme.title: Gūsteknes
programme.desc: Kelers Dovers pārdzīvo jebkuru vecāku ļaunāko murgu - nolaupīta viņa 6 gadus vecā meitiņa un viņas draudzene. Laiks skrien, taču detektīvs Lokijs, kurš vada izmeklēšanu, nonāk strupceļā. Vienīgais pavediens - netālu no nozieguma vietas noparkotais autofurgons. Taču tā šoferis, kaut sākumā arestēts, vēlāk atbrīvots pierādījumu trūkuma dēļ. Izmisuma dzīts, tēvs nolemj taisnību meklēt pats.

programme.desc: Kelers Dovers pārdzīvo jebkuru vecāku ļaunāko murgu - nolaupīta viņa 6 gadus vecā meitiņa un viņas draudzene. Laiks skrien, taču detektīvs Lokijs, kurš vada izmeklēšanu, nonāk strupceļā. Vienīgais pavediens - netālu no nozieguma vietas noparkotais autofurgons. Taču tā šoferis, kaut sākumā arestēts, vēlāk atbrīvots pierādījumu trūkuma dēļ. Izmisuma dzīts, tēvs nolemj taisnību meklēt pats.

programme.title: Marija Antuanete
programme.desc: Filma par Francijas galantā laika pavēlnieci - Mariju Antuaneti, kura kā naiva princese no Austrijas galma tika ievesta intrigu un skandālu pārbagātajā franču aristokrātijā, lai apprecētos ar Luiju XVI. Būdama pusaudze, viņa pārvar savas bailes un kļūst par vienu no pretrunīgāk vērtētajām personām - sava laikmeta un Francijas simbolu.

programme.title: Dalasas pircēju klubs
programme.desc: Teksasas kovboja Rona Vudrūfa dzīvi satricina pēkšņa diagnoze - HIV pozitīvs. Dzīvot viņam atlikušas 30 dienas. Tolaik, 1985.gadā tikai sāka apzināties AIDS izplatību un to, kā cīnīties ar šo vīrusu. Rons, no kura novērsās daudzi viņa kādreizējie draugi, sāk pats meklēt legālus un nelegālus ārstēšanās veidus... Galveno lomu filmā, kuras pamatā ir patiesi notikumi, atveido Metjū Makkonahijs, viņam līdzās Džereds Leto, Dženifera Gārnere un citi.

programme.title: Gūsteknes
programme.desc: Kelers Dovers pārdzīvo jebkuru vecāku ļaunāko murgu - nolaupīta viņa 6 gadus vecā meitiņa un viņas draudzene. Laiks skrien, taču detektīvs Lokijs, kurš vada izmeklēšanu, nonāk strupceļā. Vienīgais pavediens - netālu no nozieguma vietas noparkotais autofurgons. Taču tā šoferis, kaut sākumā arestēts, vēlāk atbrīvots pierādījumu trūkuma dēļ. Izmisuma dzīts, tēvs nolemj taisnību meklēt pats.

programme.title: Novembris
programme.desc: 2015. gada novembrī Parīzi piemeklē virkne nepieredzētu nāvējošu uzbrukumu. Heloīzes un viņas galvenā komandiera Freda vadītā pretterorisma vienība ir spiesta cīnīties ar laiku, lai notvertu vainīgos pirms tie pastrādājuši jaunu šaušalīgu uzbrukumu.

programme.title: Galvenā loma
programme.desc: Penelope Krusa un Antonio Banderass atveido divus egomaniakus, kurus noalgojis miljonārs, lai kopā uzņemtu filmu. Dzēlīga komēdija par bagātību, mākslu un lepnumu.

programme.title: Makaluso māsas
programme.desc: Marija, Pinuccia, Lia, Katia un Antonella ir piecas māsas, kuras dzīvo dzīvoklī Palermo. Kad Antonella pēkšņi nomirst, māsu attiecības tiek apgrieztas kājām gaisā uz visu atlikušo mūžu.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Cooking show.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: A formidable new contender enters the game, and the chefs face their most difficult contender challenge yet: surf and turf in only 45 minutes.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Tropic Lightning. Robert must prepare a 5-star dinner for 60 soldiers. Using only a mobile army field kitchen and meal rations, he has just seven hours to create a high-end dinner.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Joe Sasto calls out his friend Richie Farina, and Damaris Phillips battles business partner Coby Ming to settle a dispute over a fried chicken recipe.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: A Viking Feast. Robert Irvine is challenged to create a modern Viking feast. He must battle his way through a series of medieval trials in order to win modern ingredients.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Anderson V. Voltaggio
programme.desc: The Brawlers dig into their BBQ bag of tricks and create smoky feasts without wood or charcoal. The bottom three face an elimination challenge.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: The chefs make spicy street food and a finale-worthy fish dish for judge Andrew Zimmern to earn a spot in the final shift.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship

With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Fillet Frenzy. Its sink or swim for home cook Lydia Wexler as she takes on the renowned Chef Michael Voltaggio in an intense salmon showdown.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 7. Culinary show.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.
